languages.text: {n}Хормейстер приходит в сознание с резким вздохом.{/n} "Лорд-капитан. Мы... все еще живы. Бог-Император уберег нас в этот раз, но... проклятье, я ведь предупреждал!" {n}Старик горестно качает головой. Его побледневшие пальцы крепко сжаты на аквиле, украшающей пояс.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хормейстер приходит в сознание с резким вздохом.{/n} "Лорд-капитан. Мы... все еще живы. Бог-Император уберег нас в этот раз, но... проклятье, я ведь предупреждал!" {n}Старик горестно качает головой.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Choirmaster awakens with a sharp breath.{/n} "Lord Captain. We... are still alive. The God-Emperor has protected us this time, but... Curses, did I not warn you?" {n}The old man shakes his head dolefully. His pale fingers are clutching the Aquila adorning his belt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хормейстер приходит в сознание с резким вздохом.{/n} "Лорд-капитан. Мы... все еще живы. Бог-Император уберег нас в этот раз, но... проклятье, я ведь предупреждал!" {n}Старик горестно качает головой. Его побледневшие пальцы крепко сжаты на аквиле, украшающей пояс.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Choirmaster awakens with a sharp breath.{/n} "Lord Captain. We... are still alive. The God-Emperor has protected us this time, but... Curses, did I not warn you?" {n}The old man shakes his head dolefully. His pale fingers are clutching the Aquila adorning his belt.{/n}

{n}The Choirmaster comes to with a sharp sigh.{/n} "Lord Captain. We... are still alive. The God-Emperor has protected us this time, but— curses, did I not warn you?" {n}The old man presses his hands to his face ruefully.{/n}

{n}The Choirmaster awakens with a sharp breath.{/n} "Lord Captain. We... are still alive. The God-Emperor has protected us this time, but... Curses, did I not warn you?" {n}The old man shakes his head dolefully. His pale fingers are clutching the Aquila adorning his belt.{/n}

{n}The Choirmaster awakens with a sharp breath.{/n} "Lord Captain. We... are still alive. The God-Emperor has protected us this time, but... Curses, did I not warn you?" {n}The old man shakes his head dolefully. His pale fingers are clutching the Aquila adorning his belt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El maestro del Coro despierta con un jadeo.{/n} «Lord Capitán. Estamos... estamos vivos. El Dios Emperador nos ha protegido esta vez, pero... Maldición, ¿no se lo advertí?». {n}El anciano menea tristemente la cabeza. Sus dedos están lívidos y aprietan con fuerza el Aquila que decora su cinto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster awakens with a sharp breath.{/n} "Lord Captain. We... are still alive. The God-Emperor has protected us this time, but... Curses, did I not warn you?" {n}The old man shakes his head dolefully. His pale fingers are clutching the Aquila adorning his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El maestro del Coro despierta con un jadeo.{/n} «Lord Capitán. Estamos... estamos vivos. El Dios Emperador nos ha protegido esta vez, pero... Maldición, ¿no se lo advertí?». {n}El anciano menea tristemente la cabeza. Sus dedos están lívidos y aprietan con fuerza el Aquila que decora su cinto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}クワイアーマスターが、ハッと息を吸って目を覚ます。{/n} 「ロード・キャプテン、私たちは…まだ生きているぞ。今回は神帝陛下が守ってくださったが…呪いのことは警告したはずだな？」 {n}老人は悲し気に首を振る。素の青白い指は、ベルトに飾られたアクィラを握りしめていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster awakens with a sharp breath.{/n} "Lord Captain. We... are still alive. The God-Emperor has protected us this time, but... Curses, did I not warn you?" {n}The old man shakes his head dolefully. His pale fingers are clutching the Aquila adorning his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}クワイアーマスターが、ハッと息を吸って目を覚ます。{/n} 「ロード・キャプテン、私たちは…まだ生きているぞ。今回は神帝陛下が守ってくださったが…呪いのことは警告したはずだな？」 {n}老人は悲し気に首を振る。素の青白い指は、ベルトに飾られたアクィラを握りしめていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}唱诗大师醒了过来，急促地喘着气。{/n}“舰长大人，我们……还活着，看来这次是神皇保佑了我们。不过……真是要命，我不是早就警告过您了吗？”{n}老人悲伤地摇了摇头，苍白的手指握紧了腰带上的双头鹰坠饰。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster awakens with a sharp breath.{/n} "Lord Captain. We... are still alive. The God-Emperor has protected us this time, but... Curses, did I not warn you?" {n}The old man shakes his head dolefully. His pale fingers are clutching the Aquila adorning his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}唱诗大师醒了过来，急促地喘着气。{/n}“舰长大人，我们……还活着，看来这次是神皇保佑了我们。不过……真是要命，我不是早就警告过您了吗？”{n}老人悲伤地摇了摇头，苍白的手指握紧了腰带上的双头鹰坠饰。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Chormeister erwacht mit einem scharfen Atemzug.{/n} "Lord Captain. Wir ... leben noch. Dieses Mal hat uns der Gottimperator beschützt, aber ... Verdammt, hatte ich Euch nicht gewarnt?" {n}Der alte Mann schüttelt traurig den Kopf. Seine bleichen Finger umklammern den Aquila an seinem Gürtel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster awakens with a sharp breath.{/n} "Lord Captain. We... are still alive. The God-Emperor has protected us this time, but... Curses, did I not warn you?" {n}The old man shakes his head dolefully. His pale fingers are clutching the Aquila adorning his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Chormeister erwacht mit einem scharfen Atemzug.{/n} "Lord Captain. Wir ... leben noch. Dieses Mal hat uns der Gottimperator beschützt, aber ... Verdammt, hatte ich Euch nicht gewarnt?" {n}Der alte Mann schüttelt traurig den Kopf. Seine bleichen Finger umklammern den Aquila an seinem Gürtel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le maître de chœur sort de sa transe le souffle court.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. Nous... nous sommes toujours en vie. L'Empereur-Dieu nous a protégés cette fois-ci, mais... Bon sang, ce n'est pourtant pas faute de vous avoir {mf|prévenu|prévenue} ! » {n}Le vieil homme secoue la tête d'un air abattu, serrant de ses doigts exsangues l'Aquila qui orne sa ceinture.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster awakens with a sharp breath.{/n} "Lord Captain. We... are still alive. The God-Emperor has protected us this time, but... Curses, did I not warn you?" {n}The old man shakes his head dolefully. His pale fingers are clutching the Aquila adorning his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maître de chœur sort de sa transe le souffle court.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}. Nous... nous sommes toujours en vie. L'Empereur-Dieu nous a protégés cette fois-ci, mais... Bon sang, ce n'est pourtant pas faute de vous avoir {mf|prévenu|prévenue} ! » {n}Le vieil homme secoue la tête d'un air abattu, serrant de ses doigts exsangues l'Aquila qui orne sa ceinture.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Koro Şefi, sert bir şekilde nefes alarak uyanıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan. Hâlâ... Hayattayız. Tanrı İmparator bizi bu sefer korudu ama... Kahretsin, sizi uyarmadım mı ben?" {n}İhtiyar adam, efkârla kafasını sallıyor. Solgun parmakları, kemerini süsleyen Çift Başlı Kartal'a tutunuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster awakens with a sharp breath.{/n} "Lord Captain. We... are still alive. The God-Emperor has protected us this time, but... Curses, did I not warn you?" {n}The old man shakes his head dolefully. His pale fingers are clutching the Aquila adorning his belt.{/n}
